title: 4.00 GPA and first class honours!
description: University degrees aren't everything but this shows dedication!

title: I built this webapp!
description: How many candidates go to this much effort to show their enthusiasm?

title: Passionate about teaching and mentoring!
description: From teaching software development to mentoring at REA, writing blog posts to developing free online courses, I love sharing knowledge and helping people to learn new things!

title: Love to learn!
description: I always try to include something unfamiliar in every project I work on. In this project I experimented with dark mode (switch in top right), randomised css properties (why page) and dynamically changing gif-based logos.

title: Enjoy challenging things that are "impossible"!
description: I once swam out into a freezing lake to demonstrate this to one of my high school teachers (maybe more on that later). Up Bank's entire existence is challenging what's possible! Let me help you challenge!

title: Love Mario Kart!
description: 3 star trophy in all four CCs on Mario Kart 8 (Wii U). Slowly working my way back up on Switch.

title: Five years web dev experience
description: The last three of which have been primarily React. I ♥️ React (...and React Native)

title: Time management!
description: Nothing makes you manage your time more effectively than having very little of it! With a nine month old daughter I have honed my time management and prioritisation skills! An example of this is that frustrating Navbar bug described in the README!
